fields.title: Business Immigration
fields.subtitle: Empowering Entrepreneurs, Investors & Self-Employed Professionals to Launch and Grow in Canada
fields.body: At TENTACULAR IMMIGRATION SOLUTIONS LTD, we guide ambitious business-minded individuals through Canada's federal and provincial business immigration streams—helping you transition from startup idea to permanent residency, legally and strategically.

fields.title: Start-Up Visa Program
fields.subtitle: For visionary entrepreneurs with innovative business ideas
fields.description: Canada's Start-Up Visa Program is designed for visionary entrepreneurs who have the potential to build innovative businesses in Canada that can compete globally, create jobs for Canadians, and drive long-term economic growth.
requirements: Letter of Support from designated organization

fields.title: Provincial Entrepreneur Streams
fields.subtitle: Tailored pathways for regional business builders
fields.description: Each province offers entrepreneur streams under the PNP, providing permanent residence pathways to qualified businesspeople ready to invest, settle, and contribute to the local economy.

fields.title: C11 Work Permit
fields.subtitle: Launch or acquire a Canadian business without LMIA
fields.description: The C11 work permit allows entrepreneurs to enter Canada to actively manage their own business, owning at least 50% and demonstrating significant economic benefit to the country.
requirements: Own at least 50% of Canadian business

fields.title: Self-Employed Persons Program
fields.subtitle: For cultural professionals, athletes, and artists
fields.description: Direct pathway to permanent residency for individuals with relevant experience in cultural or athletic activities who intend to continue working independently in Canada.
requirements: Intent to be self-employed in Canada

fields.heading: Pitch to a Designated Organization
fields.text: Submit your business idea to a designated incubator, angel investor group, or venture capital fund. If approved, you'll receive a required Letter of Support.

fields.heading: Meet Language Requirements
fields.text: Achieve CLB 5 in English or French.

fields.heading: Prove Settlement Funds
fields.text: Demonstrate you can support yourself and your dependents in Canada (per IRCC guidelines).

fields.heading: Launch While You Wait
fields.text: Eligible applicants may apply for a temporary work permit to begin operations in Canada while awaiting permanent residence approval.

fields.title: Eligibility Assessment
fields.description: We evaluate your business concept, background, and investor readiness

fields.title: Letter of Support
fields.description: We guide you in securing endorsement from designated organizations

fields.title: Application Strategy
fields.description: We help craft a strong immigration application that meets IRCC requirements

fields.title: Business Advisory
fields.description: Expert support in business plan development and pitch preparation
For entrepreneurs joining existing startup groups
fields.note: Private-market fees, not charged by IRCC

fields.description: Business incubators, angel investors, or venture capital funds
fields.note: Varies based on business stage and potential

fields.description: Funding the actual launch of your startup

fields.heading: Start-Up Visa – Request a Quote
fields.body: Canada's Start-Up Visa Program offers permanent residence to entrepreneurs with innovative business ideas supported by a designated organization.

fields.title: Create or maintain jobs for Canadians
fields.description: Demonstrate employment opportunities for local workforce

fields.title: Introduce innovative goods or services
fields.description: Bring new technologies or solutions to Canadian market

fields.title: Expand regional economic opportunities
fields.description: Contribute to local economic development and growth

fields.title: Increase exports or develop international markets
fields.description: Help Canada expand its global trade relationships

fields.title: Extension
fields.text: Possible based on continued business operation

fields.title: PR Pathway
fields.text: Available after establishing business and Canadian work experience

fields.title: Eligibility Assessments
fields.description: Profile scoring and qualification evaluation

fields.title: Narrative Building
fields.description: Showcase cultural or athletic contributions

fields.title: Document Preparation
fields.description: Proof of self-employment and achievements

fields.title: Full Representation
fields.description: Throughout the entire application process

fields.title: Continuous Business Ownership
fields.description: Maintain active ownership or management of your Canadian business

fields.title: Job Creation for Canadians
fields.description: Demonstrate employment opportunities created for Canadian workers

fields.title: Program Compliance
fields.description: Stay compliant with all program rules and performance agreements

fields.heading: Ready to Scale Your Business in Canada?
fields.body: Let's map your path—whether you're looking to launch a startup, invest, or self-employ. We're here to help you make your Canadian business dreams a reality.
fields.tagline: Start smart. Start strong. Start with TENTACULAR IMMIGRATION SOLUTIONS LTD.
